channel.title: Posts on Zoé's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Zoé's blog

item.title: Go Bot the First
item.description: Designing a discord bot the idea behind this bot stems from a discord webhook pythonscript cron job combination i used to run in an old friend group to remind a couple people of things like taking medicine or doing other tasks, this was cumbersome and slow to do and as such i decided to tackle the issue with a proper bot, using modern technology from go to argo or flux cd

item.title: Init
item.description: git init Hello world, this is the test page for my blog
